# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  inc_lib_file_absolute_path.cir inc_lib_file_absolute_path.cir.sh inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir include_dot_top drive_letter_no_slash_path.cir inc_dlns_path lib_dlns_path DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(MAKE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/sub1/sub2)
file(COPY sub1/sub2/include2_abs_path sub1/sub2/lib2_abs_path sub1/sub2/include2_path_rel_top sub1/sub2/lib2_path_rel_top sub1/sub2/include2_path_rel_sub1 sub1/sub2/lib2_path_rel_sub1 sub1/sub2/include2 DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/sub1/sub2)
file(MAKE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/sub1)
file(COPY sub1/include1 sub1/include1b sub1/include_dot_dot sub1/dlns_path DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/sub1)
file(MAKE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/precedence)
file(COPY precedence/inc_precedence precedence/lib_precedence DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/precedence)
file(MAKE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/sub1/precedence)
file(COPY sub1/precedence/inc_precedence sub1/precedence/lib_precedence DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/sub1/precedence)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/inc_lib_file_absolute_path.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND WIN32 AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1325_SON/Win/inc_lib_file_absolute_path.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} inc_lib_file_absolute_path.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} inc_lib_file_absolute_path.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1325_SON/Win/inc_lib_file_absolute_path.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1325_SON/Win/inc_lib_file_absolute_path.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;required:windows")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND WIN32 )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1325_SON/Win/inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1325_SON/Win/inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;required:windows")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1325_SON/Win/inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1325_SON/Win/inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1325_SON/Win/inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir.prn inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1325_SON/Win/inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1325_SON/Win/inc_lib_file_relative_path.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;required:windows")
endif()
